website_summaries.verdict: This heavy-duty model is not only easy to use but durable and adjustable as well.
pros: Handle works well and doesn't require much pressure to use
Fully adjustable holes to fit any space you need
Can be used with various sizes of paper
Doesn't slide when you're trying to punch large projects
cons: Designed to take 32 sheets at a time, which is slightly less than other large-capacity punchers
Oil on the dies can sometimes transfer to paper

customer_reviews.title: I am thinking to install a homemade handle but after going to the poor reviews of this product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 3 hole "heavy" duty puncher back in 2015 and expected to last a lifetime. I barely used since, but, this week my sister need it in organizing her office paperwork. After a day of punching papers, "heavy" duty equipment broke. Specifically, the handle broke in half. After I inspected the handle, its seems that the main reason why this happened is the very cheap material that was put in the handle. I am thinking to install a homemade handle but after going to the poor reviews of this product, I think I'll just buy another brand. Overall, I am very disappointed by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bradea

customer_reviews.title: Dangit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heavy duty so it would work for some time. It's barely 3 months and it isn't working, one of the posts doesn't come down so it's now a 2 hole punch instead of 3. I've tried to figure out what to do with it but can't find a manual for directions to see if I can fix it. VERY DISAPPOINTED>
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The punch part works very well and is well made ...
customer_reviews.text: The punch part works very well and is well made, but amazingly, the sliding guide just stinks - it's very cheap and very unstable, and leads to a lot of misaligned holes punched. Would never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: JFK

customer_reviews.title: I like this paper hole puncher
customer_reviews.text: I like this paper hole puncher, it is heavy in weight and consistent in performance, but I wish it had markings for common hole punch combos like standard paper (8" x 11") and standard mini binder holes (5.5" x 8"). It took a lot of configuring to get it just right, which means I had to sit there and toy with it in addition to wasting paper. The heavy duty screws will ensure you get consistency once you settle on a paper dimension, but I still feel like common dimensions should be labeled for convenience when you purchase any hole puncher beyond the standard size.
customer_reviews.author: Sea1towne

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: This is the replacement for the product that arrived damaged. The hole punch catch attachment on the bottom of the unit arrived cracked. The replacement arrived damaged as well. The construction of the unit is not of a acceptable quality. The casting was uneven. The slide guide for the paper does not lock and slips. No, I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed In The Quality
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the good news - it punches holes. However, the overall quality is poor - not in keeping with a device of this price. The paint is some kind of heavy glob stuff which pretty well covers all of the alignment scales. But, the worst is the material used on the bottom - it appears to be a hard rubber/plastic thing. It has to be totally removed to empty the waste paper and attaches by cheap molded prongs that are supposed to go into holes in the housing. This bottom will scratch a nice desk - had to put felt furniture pads on mine. Overall, not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: hopefulbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a single hole punch to help my students make their books that needed three holes. The books are smaller and a regular 3 hole punch will not work. This works so well. I was able to adjust the settings so it punches three holes easily on my students books. It has saved my hands.
customer_reviews.author: teacher

customer_reviews.title: Great for custom-alignment of holes
customer_reviews.text: I needed to work out an alternative to the ACME pin-registration system for animation paper. I bought a pin-strip that has round pins, but the spacing of the pins is a little non-standard. This punch enables me to align the hole-positions precisely. And it is a tank! Now I can just get bond paper or 1000H Clearprint in letter size and punch my own registration-holes for animation.
customer_reviews.author: Pietro Calogero

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty - Rugged & Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: This quality 3 hole punch is for the BIG BOYS. It has the adjustments for alignment of the holes. Only a machine hole punch will supersede this boy. If you are looking for a great 3 hole punch - Stop here.
customer_reviews.author: JAHMAKER

customer_reviews.title: Why review a hole punch? It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Why review a hole punch? Because it’s just what I needed! It’s heavy duty- the holes are adjustable, there’s room for many/ or thicker papers / etc to be punched with an ergonomic handle. So yeah! I’m super happy with this hole punch!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Gilger

customer_reviews.title: Superb Hole Punch
customer_reviews.text: We needed to punch two holes at a spacing we determined on 11 x 17 paper (to hang them as signs) and most hole punches lack the flexibility we need to handle paper larger than 8-1/2 x 11) ... this hole punch greatly exceeded my expectations - it is super well made and I expect will be the last hole punch we ever need to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: 🤗
customer_reviews.text: My employer doesn't provide a decent whole puncher...as a nurse...it makes life easier to make holes through lots n lots of reports and admission papers...good move on my part to buy this
customer_reviews.author: Kim Santagata

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this for my office. Upon opening my ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my office. Upon opening my box, the 3 hole punch looked dusty, old, and used. To test it, I 3 hole punched a report. This black goo got all over the pages and the report...I sent it back immediately. Also the metal bracket in the middle was cracked and broken....
customer_reviews.author: Alex & Midori

customer_reviews.title: FINE FOR OFFICE/HOME USE
customer_reviews.text: I did not find it particularly oily. I punched right away and there was no residue. Sturdy construction of metal. You do have to adjust the holes with a screwdriver but you would have to do that anyway with any hole punch. I did not see a latch to hold the handle down for storage, so I used a bungee cord. I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves this hole punch
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to adjust the hole settings and durable. I use this product daily at work and people choose this one over the other one we have that was from Office Depot. We refer to this hole punch as “the good one”. My coworkers have actually asked for an additional one for Christmas for the office across the hall.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby V

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and easily does the job Purchased for a busy home office ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and easily does the job Purchased for a busy home office with many projects stored in notebooks. Makes quick work of hole punching a stack of papers. Note: on first few uses there is oil in the punches that transfers to the paper. On special projects you would want to do several test punches to use this up before using it on a keepsake project.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Works well, page count a little exaggerated.
customer_reviews.text: Although the description has this punch doing 32 pages at once, I would highly recommend less, if you want a clean job. Page count also is dependent on weight of paper, too. Oh, and watch your fingers on large page counts, it tends to snap through at maximum pressure, and the handle can 'git ya."
customer_reviews.author: C Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Best hole puncher I have ever owned......
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through over a dozen different hole punchers over the last ten years but this one is my last one. Solid construction. Flawless function. High capacity with little effort on the user's end. Look no further - this is the hole puncher you have always wanted for your home or work office.
customer_reviews.author: FrankMD

customer_reviews.title: Rusty
customer_reviews.text: Product came rusted. Bought in October and just used it for the first time and it leaves a rust mark around the circles. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Courtenay Rodonets

customer_reviews.title: Great! Just not the one I got.
customer_reviews.text: I’d say this would be a pretty great heavy duty hole puncher, except the one I got is flawed and rocks back and forth. The actual puncher itself is great, heavy duty, and stable, but the bottom plastic catcher seems to be ill sized for it and creates it to rock back and forth. I’ll be returning this one and trying again.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Smooth operation
customer_reviews.text: I use this punch mainly for light weight card stock or multiple sheets of 20# bond. I'm very pleased with its operation. It is adjustable but I don't use that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Christian

customer_reviews.title: 3 Hole or 2 hole punch
customer_reviews.text: Lots better than the cheaper 3 hole punch I had before, which would pinch me whenever I pressed down on it. It also punches holes smoothly. I haven't tried the two hole punch yet. I'll probably only use it to punch 3 holes. Very heavy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: littlekitty1112

customer_reviews.title: OK but oily
customer_reviews.text: Solid heavy duty punch BUT it arrives covered with manufacturing oils. I wiped most of it off of the exposed surfaces but it's still all over the punches and it leaves an oily ring on the material being punched.
customer_reviews.author: Unkl Jac

customer_reviews.title: Purchased October 30, 2019 and the handle broke off of it December 24, 2019.
customer_reviews.text: There should be a warranty on this product. It didn't even last 2 months. Stay away from this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mustang Mathews

customer_reviews.title: This has been a life saver for me, adn ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver for me, adn I don't know whY I didn't buy one years ago, and save my aching arms. I put together a lot of music binders, and the standard three hole punch was still troublesome. Tghis is heavy duty for sure, and stays put when you're trying to punch the holes.
customer_reviews.author: AMO

customer_reviews.title: Very fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I think I ordered the 2-, 3-hole punch on Labor Day Weekend and had it on the following Wednesday. It replaces a somewhat similar hole punch which lacked durability. This one appears to have a better lever attachment to the rotating shaft which activates the punches. Time will tell if that is true.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Banwart

customer_reviews.title: Disregard all the negative hype!
customer_reviews.text: This heavy duty 3 or two hole punch is the real deal! Make sure the hole spacing is properly set before you go into production mode. Standard 3-hole sets middle hole at the zero mark and the outer two are set at the furthest edge.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Chornesky

customer_reviews.title: Great, with a little fixing
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, but the "slider" that puts the page in the correct position for punching is loose and moves each time you use it. I'll need to crimp the slider to make it stick in the right position. Otherwise the holes are too high on the page.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Well made products that last.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely thankful for Quality products of impeccable integrity here on Amazon. This gem is sturdy, does everything description boast and efficiently. Previous 3 hole punch had to haggle vehemently to get 4 sheets back out of it. I do great volume in home care research, this product definitively handles every bit of it. Ty for well made products that last.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this 3 hole punch
customer_reviews.text: I use binders to keep my life in order so I use this 3 hole punch 12 months out of the year and I love it! I would not use any other 3 hole punch.
customer_reviews.author: Irma

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for heavy volume use. The larger hole size definitely helped with content control. Heavy duty and worked out heavily during the first of twenty heavy paper projects. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy J. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: I can punch 10 sheets of paper at once and it's super smooth and easy! We use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: ukulele lady

customer_reviews.title: Great punch!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, Punches a nice sized stack of paper.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Befort

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and easy to change holes
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and I do a lot of papers and needed one at home to put in my books. Tired of the cheap ones.
customer_reviews.author: i love flowers

customer_reviews.title: Not as heavy duty as it appears.
customer_reviews.text: After 7 months of relatively light use, the punch is broken. I opened up the puncher mechanism that was broken because I thought it was maybe just jammed, but it looks like the forged metal part has just sheared off. I'm surprised they made it out of so brittle a metal. This would probably be very easy to fix, just drop in a new part, but I can't seem to locate parts anywhere for this brand. When I bought this heavy duty punch, I thought I'd bought a hole puncher that would last me the next 40 years. Turns out I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: systemerror909

customer_reviews.title: I got this for the loads of papers I had to punch & kee on file
customer_reviews.text: The handle give me plenty of leverage but you do need to hold down the other end of the punch while doing large stacks of paper. I like that it's adjustable. When I need the 2 hole variety later, I can just move the punches around to suit my needs. It has a heavy rubber base on it so it won't slide or scratch any furniture. I'm glad I got it - the price was good and it definitely does the job.
customer_reviews.author: MEWTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great whole puncher
customer_reviews.text: I live this whole puncher. I had been looking for one that could be adjusted to punch three holes closer together and this one worked magically.
customer_reviews.author: Doralicia

customer_reviews.title: When you just have to have a hole or three.
customer_reviews.text: Great strong punch.. Very similar to one used in Government service. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LHR

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Period.
customer_reviews.text: No good. I returned it. This punch looks like a previous robust version that I had and liked. I could not configure the paper guide to punch 3 holes in an ordinary 8-1/2 x 11 paper. Further -- the fixed stop on the left side does not correspond to any setting. Huh? This is the first time in years that I have not bought my office supplies on Amazon. I bought -- a superb product from local Staples store -- Staples One-Touch Adjustable 3-Hole Punch, 40 Sheet Capacity, their Item: 678950.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy duty hole punch,
customer_reviews.text: Only one very small problem. I do not like the adjustment slide. It did not hold its position well so I wedged it. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Wells

customer_reviews.title: Just like at the office!
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight to this makes it easy to use and doesn't skip around the counter while punching
customer_reviews.author: Sgamez1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! But make sure you clean the punches first!!
customer_reviews.text: This hole punch is awesome! I would like to recommend that you hole punch a few blank prices of paper before you start really using it though. The punches are a little oily at first and leave an oil ring around the paper. I just grabbed a few pieces of paper and hole punched them three or four times and then it was gone. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Stinson

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Great Quality 3 Hole Punch
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted a heavy duty three hole punch and so I decided to try this brand and I am definitely not disappointed with the quality of this product. It is very heavy and works amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hillman

customer_reviews.title: Lever operation is great.
customer_reviews.text: Like the smooth lever operation of this hole punch. Those low profile units are a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: great three hole punch
customer_reviews.text: needed a multiple pages three hole punch for archival purposes. saves me a vast amount of time over the old, cranky punch.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Wior

customer_reviews.title: Does not Punch ALL holes
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this hole punch because the last two we ordered would leave the third hole un-punched. This one was no different. Still looking for a hole punch that works!
customer_reviews.author: JWingfield

customer_reviews.title: Not smooth, doesn't punch as many as it says.
customer_reviews.text: The punch isn't smooth and it doesn't punch through as many papers as it says it does. I really don't like it, but didn't feel like returning.
customer_reviews.author: dieslgrl

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, works great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for use in my classroom. After a week of heavy usage, I don't know how I lived without it in the past. I'm very satisfied and pleased with my purchase. **Update** After two years, the Officemate Heavy Duty Adjustable 2-3 Hole Punch is still going strong...even after being used daily by middle-schoolers. No regrets. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Cravey

customer_reviews.title: Old School QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: The 3 hole punch works great! I'm glad its made of heavy metal. It stays planted on the desk. Unlike the cheap plastic ones you see everywhere. This feels like it is old school quality and durability. *** punch a few blanks first, the machining and shipping grease is still present on the punches. it will self clean out after a few rounds
customer_reviews.author: B. Renken

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Been searching for something like this for months - at least one that didn't cost over $100. This works great and would definitely order again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Matuszak Hamby

customer_reviews.title: A great paper punch
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty punch that is well made. It can easily punch 12 sheets of paper at a time. It is easy to adjust. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. 007

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: We kept going to for the cheap hole punches for a while. But it got really old with how many papers we have to put into binders. This is a great product and really holds up after hundreds and hundreds of papers going through it. I can get in and clean it very well, I can take it apart and oil parts if needed, great!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of 3 hole punches. The design of this one is the easiest and most convenient to use. The price is very good. I bought 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: A Guidice

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and well made. The only reason why it was 4 star was because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jtel87

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't find it anywhere else
customer_reviews.text: I sell a book thats 8.5 x 5.5" in a binder. The printer punches it for me but occassionally I have to print a few replacement pages. Hand punching was bad. NO other office supply store here in Atlanta sold an adjustable 3 hold punch. This punch is heavy duty and will punch letter size or the book size I need or anything inbetween. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: David S. Geller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Usage: That Is All
customer_reviews.text: Just what I neede, just what I ordered, just what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Mogambo

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty adjustable 2 or 3 hole punch.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hole punch. Very sturdy and works great. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: B. Joan Hanicak

customer_reviews.title: Oh yes!
customer_reviews.text: Great choice for use in my classroom! I like the "feel" of it when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: OuidaDianne Guest

customer_reviews.title: I like the design and it punches well
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and it punches well, the first one I ordered one of the punches hung down a little to low so Amazon replaced that one this one works great
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Best Hole Punch Ever !
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and does the job better than any hole puncher we have ever had! Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: This works great and makes the job of filing so easy and ...
customer_reviews.text: This works great and makes the job of filing so easy and quick. I punched about 20 pages at a time with no issue. Adjusting the punch is easy also and the guide gives you perfect alignment each time. No issues here.
customer_reviews.author: O. K. Maharaj

customer_reviews.title: Made very well, works perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Well made product! The only plastic is the catch tray underneath. Buy some stick on no slip feet for this hulk and you will have an office monster! Fifteen pages or less works best too.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund Haardt

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty But Awkward
customer_reviews.text: The punch has to be set and the glossy black and chrome makes it nigh impossible to read the lettering...which doesn't matter, you cannot see the marks to read against anyway. So you best have a prepunched sheet to gauge it by and adjust accordingly. Once you get it set, then it works pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: T. Shields

customer_reviews.title: If you have stacks of papers to punch...
customer_reviews.text: ...this is the one for you. It makes small work of big tasks. I get my filing done in 1/2 the time!
customer_reviews.author: MWood

customer_reviews.title: Still the best
customer_reviews.text: It is oily like other reviewers stated so punch a lot of scratch paper first.
customer_reviews.author: Enthusiasm

customer_reviews.title: I like the heavy duty part of this product and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had somewhat of a time getting this hole punch adjusted for 3 hole punching. I like the heavy duty part of this product and it does a great job of the punching the holes in several sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what you want it to do.
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed. Required a bit of non-standard adjustment to create a two whole punch suitable for British two-ring binder but works very well.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Cosgrove

customer_reviews.title: Not really heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: The punch does what it should but I'm disappointed with the paper end stop. It's a little weak and doesn't stay in place like it should.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Frazelle

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Use it a couple times and it works great, especially when you have to adjust holes.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy 3hole punch
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy durable hole puncher. Very glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Janice C Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great punch!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an old punch that could hardly handle 7 sheets of paper. This punch is rugged and handles at least 30 sheets easily. Don't know why we didn't replace our old one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: doesn't work well. paper does not align properly. paper sometimes slip under the guide causing lopsided holes. the paper length guide is not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Spi 6

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for weekly punching of stacks of 5.5" notes. Adjustment has been holding in place.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Trinity

customer_reviews.title: I hate hole punches that break or don't work
customer_reviews.text: I hate hole punches that break or don't work. So far, over 1 year and no problems. I am happily hole-punching and it is well constructed and will last a long time... (as i knock on wood)
customer_reviews.author: matthew burke

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, punches through piles of paper with ease. Clean up the excess oil and grease left on it first.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Wagstaff

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: The entire office says using this hole punch has been life changing! It's the little things that make our day smooth and enjoyable! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: The hole punch is good quality, but the holes it puts in paper ...
customer_reviews.text: Look at the whole size. The hole punch is good quality, but the holes it puts in paper are surprisingly small and not that practical.
customer_reviews.author: Bass Man

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty & Worth Every Cent
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for the office in 2015 and it is still going strong. We usually use it for around 20-25 pages at a time and have had no problems with this. You do have to put some effort into it but the metal handle has not bent yet. Thinking of getting another one so we don't have to keep running it between the back and front offices!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase at this time and would recommend
customer_reviews.text: After going through several cheaper models, I purchased this one for the teachers' resource room. Definitely a heavy duty! Pleased with purchase at this time and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah from Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Damaged, but works
customer_reviews.text: The box was partially opened & had a dented corner. The product was bent on the bottom, but does hole punch.
customer_reviews.author: l bro

customer_reviews.title: This is a strong substantial hole puncher
customer_reviews.text: I was doing a writing project, and needed a good 3-hole punch. The device works very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W. Knights

customer_reviews.title: Suits Me!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic hole punch that suits my needs. If I was designing my ideal hd hole punch, It would be capable of punching through several more thicknesses of material than it is currently able. It also would be extremely EASY to use. As it is, it takes more of my arm strength which wears me out fairly quickly,especially if I have a stack(s) of paper to punch. However, after having to return several other punches to the place o purchase, I would buy this HD Punch again and again!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hays

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product. I would like for the holes to be a little larger, but you cannot find a punch like that. This was the best I could find for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Menace

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: This is versatile and easy to use. The handle lends energy to the hole punch part so that it is easier for me to punch holes in several pages at once. I Iike that it can be adjusted to serve as a two-hole punch, as well.
customer_reviews.author: C. McTyre

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product. It broke after the third use.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and durable. Other, less expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and durable. Other, less expensive punches couldn't handle more than 5 sheets at once. Solid heavy punch. It should last a long long time.
customer_reviews.author: P. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Handle a little wobbly, but works great. Cuts liar butter
customer_reviews.author: Alex white

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The punch had sufficient weight to be used without being held in place. Functioned as I wished.
customer_reviews.author: Fike

customer_reviews.title: Nice, solid hole punch.
customer_reviews.text: pretty much what you would expect. I like that it is nice and heavy duty. punches lots of holes.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: It's a good, heavy-duty paper punch. It has held up well and gets the job done. The lever gives you a lot of leverage and reduce the effort that it takes to do multi-page jobs. What else can you say about a paper punch?
customer_reviews.author: P. Bucy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't seem as sturdy as the one it replaced
customer_reviews.author: Linda Skinner

customer_reviews.title: It works great, although it says it can punch 30 sheets ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great, although it says it can punch 30 sheets at a time and I have found that difficult. So I just put in around 20 at a time and it does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: You will never need another one after you buy this. I've looked everywhere and this one is it. The price is great and makes it a great deal, not just a good one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Zolezzi

customer_reviews.title: No problems with machine oil. I don't try to ...
customer_reviews.text: No problems with machine oil. I don't try to punch the maximum number of pages, so the handle will probable not break. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Walter C.

customer_reviews.title: Best three hole punch I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best three hole punch I ever owned. Solid Sherman Tank constuction, sharp clean hole punches, nice drawer for catching punched paper.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Center punch stops cutting hole
customer_reviews.text: We got this in Oct. and the center punch has now quit working! Very disappointed that it has broke so fast!
customer_reviews.author: rick sperry

customer_reviews.title: powerful hole-puncher
customer_reviews.text: Great hole-puncher, although it has end pieces on either side that hold down the paper and make it difficult to hole-punch a stack of papers that have staples.
customer_reviews.author: mandyrin

customer_reviews.title: 3 hole punch
customer_reviews.text: This was a good buy. It's a heavy duty 3-hole punch. Good to have around the home office. I could not find this at the stores.
customer_reviews.author: sgomez

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the church office, and it saves so much time. It is easy to use, no heavy pressure needed, We really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Church secretary

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Love it. Love it. And as a teacher, I put it to the test.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

product_meta.title: Officemate Heavy Duty Adjustable 2-3 Hole Punch with Lever Handle, 32-Sheet Capacity, Black (90078)
product_meta.description:
Heavy duty punch with powerful lever-action handle for ease in operation. Capable of handling jobs up to 32 sheets of 20-lb. paper. Adjusts for 3 hole or 2 hole punching. Black.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


OFFICEMATE ADJUSTABLE 2- TO 3-HOLE PUNCH
Adjustable hole punches are used for both standard three-hole punching, plus top-of-sheet two-hole punching to accommodate prong fasteners or posts.

Officemate 90065 Officemate 90050 Officemate 90052 Officemate 90098 Officemate 90125 Officemate 90078 Style Antimicrobial EZ Lever EZ Lever Heavy Duty Auto-Centering Heavy Duty Sheet Capacity 11 15 25 30 32 32 Hole Size 9/32 inch 9/32 inch 9/32 inch 9/32 inch 9/32 inch 9/32 inch Ergonomic Padded Handle Yes Yes Yes View Window Yes Yes Yes Clippings Receptacle Removable at bottom Removable at bottom Removable at bottom Removable at bottom Flip open Removable at bottom Anti-Jam Yes Yes Paper Guide Adjustable Adjustable Adjustable Adjustable Adjustable Adjustable Construction Steel Steel Steel Steel Steel Steel Anti-Microbial Yes Additional Highlights For accurate hole punching when using prong fasteners Calibrated centering device for punching accuracy; no mar capacity for extra punching capacity; chip dispersal mechanism to prevent jams Calibrated centering device for punching accuracy; no mar capacity for extra punching capacity; chip dispersal mechanism to prevent jams Heavy duty for high-volume punching needs Serrated metal guides ensure accurate paper alignment; heavy duty for high-volume punching needs Heavy duty with powerful lever-action handle Color Black Silver/Navy Silver/Navy Black Silver/Charcoal Black

Steel construction with plastic chip tray
